title: Kroto
author: Rose Kamal Love
excerpt: Kroto simplifies product documentation for a global audience. With 60+ languages, AI voiceovers, and seamless editing, it transforms your video guides into multilingual experiences—ideal for teams communicating with diverse users.

Free Options

Kroto simplifies product documentation for a global audience. With 60+ languages, AI voiceovers, and seamless editing, it transforms your video guides into multilingual experiences—ideal for teams communicating with diverse users.
